name: Five Nights at Fulps
description:
Tomar has trapped you (Tom Fulp) inside the Newgrounds office, The only issue is he has brought some of his friends to accompany you.

There might be some minor bugs as this version of the game has not been playtested, you can always play the original version where it was intended to be played on newgrounds: https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/849998

There is an extras section on the main menu where you can find Night 6 and a Custom Night! You can use these to help complete the game if needed!

ALSO, BE CAREFUL RESIZING THE SCREEN AS IT MIGHT MESS THINGS UP! THE DEFAULT SIZE IS THE INTENDED SIZE.

HOW THEY WORK:

Stepford: Stepford follows the same path to your office each time and will always reset on stage.

Ritz: Ritz moves at random, so make sure to keep your eye on them!

Tankman: Tankman is elusive as he can attack from either side of the office.

Pico: Pico won't bite, but he'll trap you through the vent to steal your power.

Hank: Hank can hide in the dark, and sometimes completely hide from the camera.

Tomar: Make sure to gather his emeralds or he'll become a very cranky boy.

DEVELOPED BY TEAM ANGEL 2: https://twitter.com/TEAMANGEL222

@FrosstyArt Art, Animation, Coding, Audio, and Design

@ToppleNG Art, Animation and Design

@Pommisc Art,Animation and Design

@Teravex Our Music Man :)
